g.text: Not just a long-lost Jane Austin novelâ€¦

Each feature of the chart includes an affordance and a set of tasks that it is geared toward
Affordances For each affordance or task, we need to isolate the channel and mechanism and find accessible equivalent. Maybe iconic memory can be replaced with echoic or haptic? Reduce cognitive load as much as possible Anticipate user's needs Tasks are typically implicit: comparison with other data point, position in trend, assessment with regard to whole, categorizing (filtering/sorting), navigation/focus For each task, we need to make it explicit
